enhanced_by.reason: The resolve method is responsible for resolving the declaration, which is a prerequisite for converting it to Core.
Setting up the environment is necessary before converting a declaration to Core, as it affects the context in which the conversion occurs.
Both toCore(Ast.Decl) and toCore(Ast.ValDecl) convert declarations to Core, making them useful for constructing assertions about the Core conversion process.
Both toCore(Ast.Decl) and toCore(Ast.DatatypeDecl) convert declarations to Core, making them useful for constructing assertions about the Core conversion process.
